Entries.IslandBaitShop.3: Her koi seem very happy and healthy.
Entries.IslandBaitShop.5: There are a lot of fish.
Entries.Island.1: Summer Market - every summer on 15th and 16th!
Entries.IslandSummerMarket.1: Summer Market - From 6 AM to 7 PM, come check out our goods from Ghibli Town!
Entries.Island.2: The trees in this area are under Ferngill Environment Agency protection, no foresting allowed.
Entries.summermarket: Help yourself to our delicious salads!.

Entries.IslandBaitShop.1: Es un pez dorado muy hermoso.
Entries.IslandBaitShop.3: Su kois parece muy feliz y saludable.
Entries.Island.2: Los árboles en esta área están bajo la protección de la Agencia de Medio Ambiente de Ferngill, no se permite cortarlos.

Entries.Thu10: I like diving in the ocean.$h# Maybe when you have some free time you can dive with me.$1#$b#Don't worry, we won't be diving too deep!$1

Entries.Fri6: Hi sweetie! I am so fond of Linus.$1#$b#He visited me the other day.$1#$e#He made some very delicious Sashimi. I had no idea he was such a good cook!

Entries.BaitShop.1: Music bookcase read only: ^Iron Mermaiden, ^Lada del Rain, ^Yonaka, ^Emma Shapplin, ^Florence + The Recycling Machine, ^Hooverphonic, ^Claire Merguire, ^Within Temptation, ^FleetSea Mac.
Entries.BaitShop.2: Song book  - by Shireen Baratheon ^It's always summer, under the sea ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The birds have scales, and the fish take wing ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The rain is dry, and the snow falls up ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The stones crack open, the water burns ^The shadows come to dance, my love ^The shadows come to play ^The shadows come to dance, my love ^The shadows come to stay

Entries.Sat8: #$c .05#I miss the Madam, but I can't go there as often because of the store.#$e#Sometimes I wonder if I should leave everything behind and go live with her on the island.

Entries.Sun8: #$c .2#Hey @, have you been visiting the Madam?#$e#Send my regards to her.

Entries.Thu10: Me gusta bucear en el océano.$h# Quizás cuando tengas algo de tiempo libre puedas bucear conmigo.$1#$b#¡No te preocupes, no vamos a bucear demasiado profundo!$1

Entries.Fri6: ¡Hola cariño! Estoy muy encariñada con Linus.$1#$b#Me visitó el otro día.$1#$e#Hizo un delicioso Sashimi. ¡No tenía idea de que era tan buen cocinero!

Entries.BaitShop.1: Librería de música: ^Iron Mermaiden, ^Lada del Rain, ^Yonaka, ^Emma Shapplin, ^Florence + The Recycling Machine, ^Hooverphonic, ^Claire Merguire, ^Within Temptation, ^FleetSea Mac.
Entries.BaitShop.2: Cancionero  - por Shireen Baratheon ^It's always summer, under the sea ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The birds have scales, and the fish take wing ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The rain is dry, and the snow falls up ^I know, I know, oh, oh, oh ^The stones crack open, the water burns ^The shadows come to dance, my love ^The shadows come to play ^The shadows come to dance, my love ^The shadows come to stay

Entries.Sat8: #$c .05#Echo de menos a Madam, pero no puedo ir allí, menudo debido a la tienda.#$e#A veces me pregunto si debería dejar todo y vivir con ella en la isla.

Entries.Sun8: #$c .2#¿Hey @, has estado visitando a Madam?#$e#Envíale mis saludos.

Entries.madam1: Hi sweetie!^^ I hope everything is going well on the farm. Have you ever tried a tangerine before? Its sweet, citrusy taste is unforgettable! I grow them in my garden. Hisame was kind enough to give me a few saplings when she visited me during the Summer Market. They’re one of my favorites. Here's one for you to try. Enjoy!^^    -Madam %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Tangerine}} 1 %%
Entries.madam2: Hello sweetie!^^  I was in my garden earlier and thought of you, so I decided to send you a gift! It’s a green coconut! This is no ordinary coconut, mind you. This type of coconut is just like the ones I had back home, in the bay of Sh’eenaz! The green coconut is much better than the ones from the desert. I hope you’ll enjoy it!^^    -Madam %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Green Coconut}} 1 %%
Entries.madam3: Dear @,^^  How are you? I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to ask if you’ve ever tried a red dragon fruit! They have such an exotic flavor. I grow them in my garden, that I share with the snow fox. I have enclosed one for you to try. Hope you like it!^^   -Madam %item object {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Red Dragon Fruit}} 1 %%
Entries.madam4: Hello @!^^  Hope you are doing well, I've sent you a little gift. I wish you a lovely day and look forward to seeing you again.^^  -Madam %item object 209 1 202 1 %%
